name: Intersection of First St and Hill St
description: The intersection of First and Hill Streets, a quiet residential corner. You are at the intersection of First St and Hill St, a quiet residential corner where the illusion of suburban tranquility is still somewhat intact. Hill St continues its journey to the north and south, a ribbon of asphalt winding through neatly trimmed lawns and a few houses that have seen better decades. First St stretches to the east, leading to places unknown. To the west, the Texaco sign beckons, a beacon of fossil-fueled hope. The air is still, broken only by the distant hum of traffic and the occasional chirping of a bird, oblivious to the subtle decay.
